urls.title: Lisbon Addictions 2022
urls.description: Lisbon Addictions is a multidisciplinary conference that provides a forum for networking across the addictions. In order to shape the Lisbon Addictions programme, the conference organisers will adopt once again a co-production approach. Working closely with the co-producers, the conference team will develop a rich, diverse and innovative programme by organising thematic tracks around selected topics. #LxAddictions22 provides a unique networking opportunity for researchers, practitioners and policy
